vote.text: Amendment SA 2520 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2520 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S12711; text: CR S12711) To strike certain provisions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2520 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
